entries.quest_in_progress: pcontrast3 Mission in Progress: < pcontrast1 %TO pcontrast3 >  pcontrast2 (You must complete the mission before leaving this sector.) pcontrast3
entries.patrol_circuit_complete: pcontrast3 Mission Update: < pcontrast1 Patrol circuit complete. %DI circuit(s) remaining. pcontrast3 >
entries.patrol_target_eliminated: Target eliminated.  Now finish your patrol.
entries.patrol_waypoint_arrived: You have arrived at a patrol nav point.
entries.escort_waypoint_arrived: You have arrived at the escort rendezvous.
entries.escort_failed_protect: You failed to protect your escort target!
entries.escort_too_far1: You're too far out.  Tighten up!
entries.escort_too_far2: You're still too far out.  We need an escort here!
entries.escort_too_far3: This area is too hot to fly without an escort.   We're retreating.  Your superiors will hear about this!
entries.destroy_target_waypoints: waypoint(s) to possible destroy target locations have been added to your datapad.
entries.destroy_duty_round_reward: pcontrast3 > pcontrast1 All waves eliminated. Reward: pcontrast2 %DI pcontrast1 credits. pcontrast3 <
entries.duty_already: You already have an assigned duty!
entries.destroy_special_reward: credits have been awarded as an outstanding duty performance bonus.
entries.destroy_duty_complete_reward: >  pcontrast1 Duty completion bonus: pcontrast2 %DI pcontrast1 credits. <
entries.patrol_lap_reward: credits have been awarded for your patrol circuit.
entries.quest_alert_s: pcontrast2 Mission Alert: pcontrast3 < pcontrast1 %TO pcontrast3 >
entries.destroy_abandoned: You have ended your duty mission.
entries.escort_reward: pcontrast3 > pcontrast1 Escort complete. Reward: pcontrast2 %DI pcontrast1 credits. pcontrast3 <
entries.escort_badge_reward: credits and a badge have been awarded for distinguished escort service!
entries.destroy_target_waypoints_disable: waypoint(s) to possible disable target locations have been added to your datapad.
entries.inspect_target_waypoints: waypoint(s) to possible inspection target locations have been added to your datapad.
entries.not_in_inv: That object must be in your inventory.
entries.signed: Your digital signature was imprinted on the form.
entries.ta_text: The documents contained herein are an accurate and complete record of the undersigned pilot's history with the Imperial Navy. This document confirms the undersigned to be transferred to a new posting as indicated in the contained form 57/G.  Authorized this day by the Imperial Naval Command.
entries.ta_sign: Please indicate your confirmation of the information contained in this document as true and complete by signing with your full name below.
entries.recovery_abandoned: You abandoned the mission and the target escaped!
entries.capture_failed_escape: Your capture target has escaped the area!
entries.capture_started: Primary mission target capture op underway.
entries.capture_complete: Primary mission target capture op complete!
entries.capture_recovery_success: The captured ship has been secured!
entries.capture_escort_remaining: ship(s) remain(s) in the target's escort.
entries.capture_escort_wiped_out: The target's escort has been eliminated.
entries.destroy_duty_target_located: pcontrast3 > pcontrast1 Duty target located. A waypoint has been created. pcontrast3 <
entries.destroy_duty_target_detected: pcontrast3 > pcontrast1 Enemy targets are on an attack vector! pcontrast3 <
entries.destroy_duty_targets_remaining: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Target destroyed. %DI target(s) remain. pcontrast3 >
entries.destroy_duty_targets_dead: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < ffff00All enemy targets destroyed. pcontrast3 >
entries.destroy_duty_level_increase: pcontrast3 > ff0000 Stronger enemy ships have entered the sector! pcontrast3 <
entries.destroy_duty_level_boss: pcontrast3 > ff0000 An enemy commander has been dispatched to stop you! pcontrast3 <
entries.destroy_duty_level_boss_dead: pcontrast3 > 00ff00 The enemy commander has been defeated! pcontrast3 <  pcontrast3 > ff0000 In response, more enemy ships have entered the sector! pcontrast3 <
entries.destroy_duty_boss_detected: pcontrast3 > ff0000 The enemy commander's wing is moving to attack! pcontrast3 <
entries.destroy_duty_boss_dead: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < 00ff00 The enemy commander's wing has been eliminated! pcontrast3 >
entries.destroy_duty_boss_reward: >  pcontrast1 Command wing elimination bonus: pcontrast2 %DI pcontrast1 credits. <
entries.destoroy_duty_complete: pcontrast3 > 00ff00 All objectives eliminated. No further enemies challenge you. pcontrast3 <
entries.destroy_surprise_abandoned: You ran away from the attack and abandoned your duty!
entries.destroy_surprise_attack: ships have entered the area and are closing to attack!

entries.quest_failed_group: pcontrast3 %TO failed a mission: < pcontrast1 %TT pcontrast3 >
entries.quest_aborted_group: pcontrast3 %TO aborted a mission: < pcontrast1 %TT pcontrast3 >

entries.inspect_found_cargo: 00ff00 This is the cargo you're looking for. Press the 'U' key to retrieve it! pcontrast3
entries.wave_defeated: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 A wave of enemies has been destroyed. pcontrast3 >
entries.wave_launched: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 A wave of enemies is attacking! pcontrast3 >
entries.battle_abandoned: You left your allies to die in battle!
entries.quest_reward: A payment of %DI credits have been transferred to your bank account.
entries.warpout_failure: ff0000 You took too long to complete the mission. A critical target has left the system! pcontrast3
entries.jtl_required: Unable to assign mission:  This mission requires Star Wars Galaxies: Jump to Lightspeed.
entries.rescue_target_disabled: The ship you are escorting has become disabled! Dock with it to perform quick repairs.
entries.survival_abandoned: You have failed the mission due to abandoning your assignment.
entries.convoy_survived: %DF% of the convoy arrived safely! Each member of your team will receive %DI credits in payment.
entries.convoy_perfect: You successfully protected the entire convoy! A bonus of %DI credits has been awarded to your team.
entries.group_quest_received: You have received a group quest flag!
entries.group_quest_failed: You have failed a group quest!
entries.group_quest_won: You have won a group quest!
entries.group_quest_aborted: Your group quest has been aborted.
entries.left_group_quest: You have left a group quest.
entries.palace_access_text: This document authorizes the named subject access to all general parts of our benevolent Lord Jabba's grand palace. By signing this you agree that as long as you are a guest in our magnificent Lord Jabba's spectacular palace you are the property of our wise and kind Lord Jabba. You also abide to follow all rules stated in document I-32 and understand that failure in doing so may be punished by your termination.
entries.palace_access_title: Authorization of Access to the Palace of Lord Jabba
entries.palace_access_sign: Please indicate that you understand what you have just read (or what was read to you) by signing the dotted line on the very bottom of this document. For those without reading and writing comprehension, a thumb (or other appropriate limb) print is acceptable.
entries.quest_ended_group: pcontrast3 %TO ended a mission: < pcontrast1 %TT pcontrast3 >
entries.mining_abandoned: You have ended your mining mission.
